title: manak-kavalai tIrkkum
sahitya:
manak-kavalai tIrkkum marundE uyar malai mIdum mayil mIdum irundE anbar


anupallavi

  tanip-perum shuDarAga ezhunE kaNNil teriginra mei jnAnak-kozhundE


caraNam    sEvark-koDi nizhalil amarndE aruL sErum vaDivElai sumandE bhakti
mEvum tamizh maraiyil vaLarndE tozhum mElOr vizhi inikkum virundE
